help_troubleshooting_log.lang_htl1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_troubleshooting_log.lang_htl4: The Log option allows you to monitor traffic between the local network and the Internet.
help_troubleshooting_log.lang_htl6: To view the logs, click this option.
help_troubleshooting_log.lang_htl7: The Incoming Log displays a temporary log for the incoming Internet traffic. The Outgoing Log displays a temporary log for the outgoing Internet traffic. The Security log displays the login information for the Router's browser-based utility. The DHCP Client Log displays the local DHCP server status information.
help_troubleshooting_log.lang_htl8: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
